Translations.Text: Jya lokanna amacyajavala yenyavara visvasa nahi ani te aihika jivanavara raji jhale aheta ani tyataca jiva guntavuna basale aheta ani je amacya ayatimpasuna gaphila aheta
Asa lokance thikana tyancya karmammule naraka (jahannama) ahe

Nihsansaya, jya lokanni imana rakhale ani tyanni satkarme kelita, tara tyanca palanakarta te imanadharaka asanyacya sababivara tyanna (tyancya dhyeya uddistaprata) pohacavila, sukhacya asa bagammadhye, jyancya khali pravaha vahata asatila

Tithe tyancya tonduna udâ€Œgara nighela subahanallaha1 (allaha pavitra ahe) ani tyance ekamekansi abhivadana asela as'salamu alaikuma (salamati aso tumacyavara) ani sevati te he mhanatila ki samasta stuti prasansa allahakaritaca ahe, jo samasta visvanca palanakarta ahe

Ani jara allahane lokanna tvarita hani pohacavili asati, jase loka tvarita labha icchitata, tevha tyancya vayada kevhaca purna jhala asata yastava amhi tya lokanna tyancya dasevara sodato, jyanna amacyajavala ghenyavara visvasa nahi, yasathi ki tyanni apalya vidrohata bhatakata rahave

Ani jevha manasala ekhadi duhkha-yatana pohocate, tevha amhala pukarato, pahudalelya sthititahi, basalelya sthititahi, ubha asatanahi. Maga jevha amhi tyaci duhkha-yatana dura karato, tevha to asa hoto ki janu tyane apalyala pohocalelya duhkha-yatanekarita amhala kadhi pukaraleca navhate1 ya maryada olandanaryanci karme tyacyakarita tyacapramane manapasanta banavili geli aheta

Ani amhi tumacyapurvi kityeka asa janasamuhanca sarvanasa kela jevha tyanni atyacara kela, vastavika tyancyajavala tyance paigambarahi nisanya ghe'una ale hote ani te kevha ase hote ki imana rakhale asate? Aparadhi lokanna amhi asaca prakare danda deto
Maga tyancyanantara amhi ya jagata tyancyajagi tumhala abada kele yasathi ki amhi he baghave ki tumhi kasa prakaraci kame karatata
